name: Glued Together
description:
GluedTogether is a puzzle game where you arrange a group of stickmen and watch them go through the level on their own.

How they'll move will be entirely based on how you've arranged them. For example, more running stickmen will cause your group to run faster but more stickmen in the group would slow you down. More jumping stickmen means that you'll jump higher, but the more stickmen in your group, the heavier the group becomes.

There are 12 levels, several with more than one solution. Good luck and have fun!
